The Most Ridiculous Music-Related wikiHow How-To Guides

posted by Jules Muir on November 25, 2014 in Features
1

3

PreviousShift + ← / NextShift + →

Image via Jay Z's "I Just Wanna Love U (Give it 2 Me)" Music Video

Searching specific how-to’s on the internet is something many of us do pretty regularly. Whether you need to know how to baste the Thanksgiving turkey or unlock an iPhone, wikiHow—a website that anyone can edit—is one of the best websites to compensate for any lack of expertise. Peruse the pages and you’ll easily find a number of valuable guides; that is, until you specifically search for music-related how-to wikis. The site quickly takes a turn for the worst, leaving heads shaking at the existence of guides to "Buying Punk Music for a Party" and "Being A Music Teacher's Pet."

Here, thanks to the wonders of the internet, are the most ridiculous music-related wikiHow how-to guides.
